PerfectNetExp.abs: 人物词汇专辑70-英语文章阅读-大耳朵英语 -... ... believer 信徒，信仰者 disbeliever 不信宗教的人 reliever 急救者，接替者.

list.abs: I disbelieve in UFOs ., 我不相信幽.
Please believe yourself but disbelieve the world ., 请相信你自己但不要相信这个世界.
I said " Really ? " in a disbelieving tone , but leaned forward to kiss her anyway .我用怀疑的口气问道：“真的吗？”，并凑过去吻她。
Palestinians therefore utterly disbelieve American protestations of even - handedness ., 因此 , 巴勒斯坦完全不相信美国会所宣称的公正无私.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who refuses to believe (as in a divinity)

auth_sentence.content: "There is a version of Islam that says, Whoever disagrees with me is a disbeliever and must be killed,' " he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "There is a version of Islam that says, Whoever disagrees with me is a disbeliever and must be killed,' " he said.
